entry.title: First Agorava news
entry.summary: Here we go! Hey guys! This is the first news about Agorava. How? To write other news, just create a file like yyyy-mm-dd-your-news-name.textile inside the news folder, copy/paste the header of another news and start writing your own using Textile syntax....
entry.content:
Here we go!

Hey guys! This is the first news about Agorava.

How?

To write other news, just create a file like yyyy-mm-dd-your-news-name.textile inside the news folder, copy/paste the header of another news and start writing your own using Textile syntax.
